item.rechanted.mysterious_book.desc: A book sealed by magic. Said to contain an enchantment within.
tooltip.rechanted.enchantment_table.dust: A book containing magic of lesser but modest value...
tooltip.rechanted.enchantment_table.ench: A book with mysterious spirit, concealed occult magic inside
tooltip.rechanted.enchantment_table.righ: Right click to return to main enchanter screen
message.rechanted.insufficient_books: You only have %d/%d of the required bookshelves in range!
message.rechanted.insufficient_floor: You only have %d/%d of the required %s floor!
message.rechanted.inventory_full: You do not have enough space in your inventory for a book!
creative.rechanted.title: Rechanted
item.rechanted.chance_gem.desc: Randomizes the success rate on an enchanted book.
item.rechanted.chance_gem.desc_lore: Legend has it, it can alter fate itself.
item.rechanted.shiny_chance_gem.desc: Randomizes the success rate on an enchanted book. Its shimmer seems boundless.
item.rechanted.shiny_chance_gem.desc_lor: You hold a thread of fate itself, use it wisely, it won't last forever.
item.rechanted.return_gem.desc: Safely teleport to your current respawn point.
item.rechanted.return_gem.desc_lore: This gem fills you with a sense of overwhelming safety. You will be warm again.
item.rechanted.tasty_gem.desc: Consume to prevent hunger loss except when healing, and slowly regenerate health.
item.rechanted.tasty_gem.desc_lore: Infused with the essence of all the meals in the world.
item.rechanted.warp_gem.desc: Can be thrown for safe teleportation. The gem is unstable and has undefined effects and durability.
item.rechanted.warp_gem.desc_lore: You feel a soul trapped inside yearning for freedom.
item.rechanted.lucky_gem.desc: Launches forward where you aim and hangs in the air. It feels like a promise of something bigger.
item.rechanted.lucky_gem.desc_lore: A kings ransom to any who utilize this gem. Are ya feeling lucky?
item.rechanted.clone_gem.desc: Becomes a clone of ANY enchanted book that has not been cloned before and is not itself a clone.
item.rechanted.clone_gem.desc_lore: This gem has an unending need to create, but is only capable of mimicry.
item.rechanted.smithing_gem.desc: Can be used to forge Netherite gear.
item.rechanted.smithing_gem.desc_lore: You feel the never ending heat of the nether burn within.
enchantment.rechanted.thunder_strike.des: Chance to summon lightning to strike your targets.
enchantment.rechanted.bash.desc: Knocks an attacker back if blocking.
enchantment.rechanted.courage.desc: Gain a burst of speed on a successful block.
enchantment.rechanted.voids_bane.desc: Greatly increases damage to mobs while in the End.
enchantment.rechanted.hells_fury.desc: Greatly increases damage to mobs while in the Nether.
enchantment.rechanted.ice_aspect.desc: Targets will be slowed for a short period when attacked.
enchantment.rechanted.wisdom.desc: Increased EXP drops from mined ores.
enchantment.rechanted.inquisitive.desc: Increased EXP drops from killed mobs.
enchantment.rechanted.berserk.desc: When reaching low health, will cause the weapon to deal increased damage for a duration.
enchantment.rechanted.blitz.desc: Land many rapid hits to build an escalating combo of increased damage.
enchantment.rechanted.telekinesis.desc: Item drops begin to gravitate towards you.
enchantment.rechanted.timber.desc: Harvest the entire tree when breaking logs.
enchantment.rechanted.rebirth.desc: Brings your item back from death with a reset to repair cost.
enchantment.rechanted.reborn.desc: Prevents an item from being reborn again.
enchantment.rechanted.spring.desc: Sneak for a short time to charge a powerful jump.
enchantment.rechanted.volley.desc: Chance to shoot multiple arrows with each shot.
enchantment.rechanted.reach.desc: Increases block interaction reach while holding the tool.
enchantment.minecraft.breach.desc: Reduces target armor effectiveness when striking with a mace.
enchantment.minecraft.density.desc: Increases smash damage based on fall distance.
enchantment.minecraft.wind_burst.desc: Launches the attacker upward after a successful smash attack.
enchantment.minecraft.lunge.desc: Propels the attacker forward after a jab.
enchantment.minecraft.protection.desc: Reduces most types of damage by increasing amounts.
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Reduces damage and burn time when lit on fire.
enchantment.minecraft.feather_falling.de: Reduces the damage dealt from falling.
enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d: Reduces the damage and knockback of explosions.
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: Reduces the damage dealt from projectiles.
enchantment.minecraft.respiration.desc: Extends the breathing time while submerged underwater.
enchantment.minecraft.aqua_affinity.desc: Increases mining speed while submerged underwater.
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.desc: Reflects the damage taken when hit, at the cost of durability.
enchantment.minecraft.depth_strider.desc: Increases movement speed while submerged underwater.
enchantment.minecraft.frost_walker.desc: Changes the water blocks beneath the player into frosted ice.
enchantment.minecraft.binding_curse.desc: Armor cannot be removed from unless the cause is death or breaking.
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.desc: Increases the walking speed on soul sand and soul soil.
enchantment.minecraft.sharpness.desc: Increases the damage dealt from weapons.
enchantment.minecraft.smite.desc: Increases the damage dealt to undead mobs.
enchantment.minecraft.bane_of_arthropods: Increases damage and applies Slowness IV to arthropod mobs.
enchantment.minecraft.knockback.desc: Knocks mobs away from you when hit.
enchantment.minecraft.fire_aspect.desc: Lights a target on fire when hit.
enchantment.minecraft.looting.desc: Increases the amount of loot dropped by mobs.
enchantment.minecraft.sweeping_edge.desc: Increases the damage done from sweeping attacks.
enchantment.minecraft.efficiency.desc: Increases the mining speed of tools.
enchantment.minecraft.silk_touch.desc: Mined blocks will drop as blocks instead of dropping their loot.
enchantment.minecraft.unbreaking.desc: Increases the durability of the item.
enchantment.minecraft.fortune.desc: Increases the drop chances of certain blocks.
enchantment.minecraft.power.desc: Increases the damage dealt from arrows.
enchantment.minecraft.punch.desc: Increases the knockback power of arrows.
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc: Arrows are not consumed when firing.
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de: Increases the rate of rare loot from fishing.
enchantment.minecraft.lure.desc: Decreases the wait time until fish bites.
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.desc: Deals additional damage to mobs that spawn naturally in the ocean.
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.desc: Launches player with a Trident when thrown, but only in rain or water.
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: Channels a bolt of lightning toward a target hit during a thunderstorm.
enchantment.minecraft.multishot.desc: Shoot three arrows at the cost of one, but only one can be recovered.
enchantment.minecraft.quick_charge.desc: Decreases the charging time of crossbows.
enchantment.minecraft.piercing.desc: Arrows can pass through multiple entities.
enchantment.minecraft.mending.desc: Repairs the item when gaining XP orbs.
enchantment.minecraft.vanishing_curse.de: Item is forever destroyed upon death.
sounds.rechanted.enchanted_book_fail: Book failed to enchant item sound
